name: Suitors
description:
Suitors is all about creating your personal ideal lineage, with the catch that you only have one choice for who has your next generation. This puzzle game will have you guessing who is the best for you while dropping subtle and not-so-subtle hints as to what traits each suitor has. Make wise choices as you go through your stack of suitors, as you don’t know how large your suitor pool is!

After selecting begin, your first task will be to choose who you are. You must select one option from this beginning stack. Your options are limited, so be sure not to be picky. If you reject all of the beginning options, you will automatically lose the game.

Once you have chosen your starting profile, you will be taken into an online dating style app where you begin looking through your potential suitors. Some important things to note before you begin:

Your own personal traits are on the left of the screen. Use these to determine what kind of suitors you’ll need to choose in order to achieve your lineage goal.

At the top you’ll find your stats. These can help you with certain aspects of the game to assist your decision making. Athleticism will increase your chances of having twins, which means you’ll be able to choose which of the two options is most ideal to your goal. Charm will increase your suitor pool, as more people are drawn in by your charm. Intelligence will increase how much information is available to you in the suitor’s biographies, making it easier to choose your ideal match.

In the bottom left corner of the screen will be your lineage goal. This will let you know what traits are required for you to win the game.

Good luck!
